/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The road is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. On either side of the road, trees and buildings rise up, adding depth and context to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
